song_lyrics: Bhar de āj dīnan kī zolī dvār āyā Swāmī
Tū dātā hai mai hū bhikhārī tū hai sabakā Swāmī... °ṭek
Janam janamse bhaṭku mai to bāndhī pāp gaṭhariyā
Āj yahā aur kal jahā mai ḍhūnḍhu terī nagariyā
Sharane āyā torī sānvariyā, svīkāro antaryāmī... Bhar° 1
Dayā prem aur dharam bhagati se bhar de zolī merī
Aisī bhar de aur gunanse chhalake zolī merī
Miṭā de bhav bhavkā ferā, sunlo merī Swāmī ho... Bhar° 2
title: Bhar de āj dīnan kī zolī dvāre āyā Swāmī

2-307: unknown
